import React from "react"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import ReactDOM from "react-dom"; import { useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; import axios from 'axios'; import "../ProductsBidsDisplay/ProductsBidsDisplay.css" function ProductsBidsDisplay({closeBidsModal}){ return ReactDOM.createPortal(<>

Edit Product

General Info

{setProductName(e.target.value)}} type="text" id="prodName" name="Product Name" className="abcd" placeholder="Product Name" value={product_name}/> {setCost(e.target.value)}} value={cost} type="number" id="cost" className="abcd" name="cost" placeholder="Cost"/> {setYearOfBuying(e.target.value)}} value={yearofBuying} type="number" id="year" name="year" className="abcd" placeholder="Year of Buying"/>
Warranty available { warranty?{setWarranty(e.target.checked)}} className="Ask" name="warranty" type="checkbox" />:{setWarranty(e.target.checked)}} className="Ask" name="warranty" type="checkbox" /> } {/* {setWarranty(e.target.checked)}} className="Ask" name="warranty" type="checkbox" /> */}
Show Bids on Page { showBids?{setShowBids(e.target.checked)}} className="Ask" name="bids_show" type="checkbox" />:{setShowBids(e.target.checked)}} className="Ask" name="bids_show" type="checkbox" /> } {/* {setShowBids(e.target.checked)}} className="Ask" name="bids_show" type="checkbox" /> */}
{/* ValidateandSubmit */}

Add Images

{setdayta(event.target.files)}} /> {/* */}
, document.getElementById("myModal")); }; export default ProductsBidsDisplay;
